movies.title: The Good Dinosaur
movies.overview: In a world where dinosaurs never went extinct, a timid Apatosaurus named Arlo makes an unlikely human friend, and together they embark on a journey to find Arlo's way home.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.overview: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team mistakenly assumes he is dead. Using his ingenuity and spirit, he must figure out how to survive while awaiting rescue.

movies.title: The Night Before
movies.overview: On Christmas Eve, three lifelong friends spend their last Christmas Eve together looking for the Holy Grail of Christmas parties.

movies.title: Creed
movies.overview: Adonis Johnson, the son of Apollo Creed, seeks out Rocky Balboa to train him in the ring and help him prove himself in the world of boxing.

movies.title: Victor Frankenstein
movies.overview: Told from Igor's perspective, the story follows the relationship between Victor Frankenstein and his protégé Igor as they create a creature and explore the nature of life and death.

movies.title: The Danish Girl
movies.overview: A fictionalized account of the life of Danish painter Einar Wegener, who was one of the first recipients of gender confirmation surgery in the 1920s.

movies.title: Spectre
movies.overview: James Bond uncovers a sinister organization while facing a ghost from his past and confronting the secrets of his own history.
